mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOOK (BOOK_SEQ, U_ID, B_DATE, PRICE, B_WISHLIST, T_ID, B_TIMETABLE) VALUES (TB_BOOK_SEQ.nextval, #{uid}, #{bdate}, #{price}, #{bWishList}, #{tid}, #{timeTable})
mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_SEQ AS idx, B_DATE AS bdate, B_TIMETABLE AS timeTable FROM TB_BOOK WHERE T_ID = #{tid} AND B_DATE = #{bdate}
